article_title: Why Business Owners Should Help Their Employees Get On Medicaid

article_metadata.author: My Say

og.description: Your company can take advantage of this program by helping low-income employees enroll in Medicaid, thereby keeping your business’s healthcare costs down, meeting legal obligations, and fulfilling your fiduciary duty to your investors.
